articles.title: Trump says Syria 'not our fight'. Staying out may not be so easy - BBC.com
articles.description: Donald Trump has promised to keep America out of the Middle East, but Assad's dramatic fall has upended the region's balance of power.
articles.content:
While Trump visited the newly restored Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris, Islamist fighters in Syria toppled Assad's regime
When Donald Trump sat with world leaders in Paris last weekend to marvel at th… [+9397 chars]
